quotes.quote: All the freaky people make the beauty of the world.
Be eccentric now. Don't wait for old age to wear purple.
Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric.
How strange when an illusion dies. It's as though you've lost a child.
Fear is the freaky troll under the bridge that leads to achievement.
If you're not okay with the freaky truth about what you do and why you do it, then why should anyone else be?
Oddity, like beauty, is in the eye of the beholder. What one person rejects as lunacy, another reveres as truth.
Strange customs do not thrive in foreign soil.
We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
Develop your eccentricities early, and no one will think you're going senile later in life.

The eccentric never changes themselves, never even contemplates doing that, ... They're always true to their own nature and as far as they're concerned, the rest of society can either like them or not.
Be virtuous and you will be eccentric.

Let your mind start a journey thru a strange new world. Leave all thoughts of the world you knew before. Let your soul take you where you long to be...Close your eyes let your spirit start to soar, and you'll live as you've never lived before.
It's strange that words are so inadequate. Yet, like the asthmatic struggling for breath, so the lover must struggle for words.
The sensibility of man to trifles, and his insensibility to great things, indicates a strange inversion.

It would be so weird if we knew just as much as we needed to know to answer all the questions of the universe. Wouldn't that be freaky? Whereas the probability is high that there is a vast reality that we have no way to perceive, that's actually bearing down on us now and influencing everything.
People think that I must be a very strange person. This is not correct. I have the heart of a small boy. It is in a glass jar on my desk.
I know the dark delight of being strange, The penalty of difference in the crowd, The loneliness of wisdom among fools.
There are certain queer times and occasions in this strange mixed affair we call life when a man takes his whole universe for a vast practical joke.
Freaky things happen all the time in the world. I suppose everything has to happen for the first time at some point.
As life runs on, the road grows strange with faces new -- and near the end. The milestones into headstones change, Neath every one a friend.
How strange this fear of death is! We are never frightened at a sunset.
It is the strange fate of man, that even in the greatest of evils the fear of the worst continues to haunt him.
It is strange that modesty is the rule for women when what they most value in men is boldness.
Strange that creatures without backbones have the hardest shells.
How strange that nature does not knock, and yet does not intrude!
It is very strange that the years teach us patience - that the shorter our time, the greater our capacity for waiting.
So many new ideas are at first strange and horrible, though ultimately valuable that a very heavy responsibility rests upon those who would prevent their dissemination.
